parameters.name: messages

parameters.jsCode:
// Extract AI response const groqResponse = $input.item.json; const aiMessage = groqResponse.choices[0].message.content; // Get validation data from previous node const validationData = $node["Format Validation Data"].json; const changes = validationData.changes; // Build alert email body const emailBody = `

‚ö†Ô∏è TradeAgent Validation Alert

10:00 AM EST Market Update | ${new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', {timeZone: 'America/New_York', weekday: 'long', month: 'short', day: 'numeric'})}

üö® Changes Detected: Significant updates to pre-market picks detected in validation scan.
${changes.dropped.length}
Dropped
${changes.added.length}
Added
${changes.score_changes.length}
Score Changes
${changes.price_moves.length}
Price Moves >2%

ü§ñ AI Analysis

${aiMessage}
${changes.dropped.length > 0 ? `
‚ùå Dropped from Top 10:
    ${changes.dropped.map(d => `
  • ${d.ticker} - Previously ranked #${d.old_rank} (score: ${d.old_score.toFixed(3)})
    • `).join('')}
` : ''} ${changes.added.length > 0 ? `
‚úÖ Added to Top 10:
    ${changes.added.map(a => `
  • ${a.ticker} - New rank #${a.new_rank} (score: ${a.new_score.toFixed(3)})
    • `).join('')}
` : ''} ${changes.price_moves.length > 0 ? `
üìä Significant Price Moves:
    ${changes.price_moves.map(p => `
  • ${p.ticker}: $${p.old_price.toFixed(2)} ‚Üí $${p.new_price.toFixed(2)} (${p.change_pct > 0 ? '+' : ''}${p.change_pct.toFixed(2)}%)
    • `).join('')}
` : ''} ${changes.score_changes.length > 0 ? `
üìà Score Changes:
    ${changes.score_changes.map(s => `
  • ${s.ticker}: ${s.old_score.toFixed(3)} ‚Üí ${s.new_score.toFixed(3)} (${s.change > 0 ? '+' : ''}${s.change.toFixed(3)})
    • `).join('')}
` : ''}

TradeAgent v0.1.0 | Validation Scan Alert

Review updated signals and adjust watchlist accordingly.

`; return { subject: `‚ö†Ô∏è TradeAgent Alert - Changes Detected (${new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', {timeZone: 'America/New_York', month: 'short', day: 'numeric', hour: 'numeric', minute: '2-digit'})})`, body: emailBody, validation_data: validationData };
